name: NBCNews
text:
When ‘Godzilla' premiered in Japan, many who watched left in tears. American audiences, however, had an opposite reaction.

The stark contrast reflects how Hollywood took the Japanese concept and scrubbed it of its political message. https://t.co/Lo2Z5nMQQe (1/10) #NBCNewsThreads
